comments.en: HP C6614A (black) and HP 51649G (color), instead of the black cartridge a photo cartridge can be used.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver. 600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

Older user comments:

Far as I can tell everything's working fine

toby.cabot@pobox.com: Text quality is excellent at 600x600. The comments in the ghostscript docs about gamma correction apply here. Photo images seem kinda muddy, especially at 600x600. If you figure out a way to fix this cleanly using RH driver scripts please let me know.

The docs mention a special photo cartridge but I havn't tried that yet

Don't forget - this printer (and pretty much any other this cheap) can't do better than 600x300 in color.
